title: Provides for a tax deduction not to exceed two hundred dollars for monetary gifts to a library as defined under section 253 of the education law
summary: Provides for a personal income tax deduction not to exceed two hundred dollars for monetary gifts to a public library; provides such monetary gifts must be used for the purchase of books or towards acquisition of computers and software by the library; directs library to issue a receipt for such donation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to making monetary gifts to libraries
